snippet: “We truly believe the best place in America to build your company is in the Midwest,” says one of the partners behind Drive Capital, which aims to bring Silicon Valley-style investing to the Midwest.
abstract: “We truly believe the best place in America to build your company is in the Midwest,” says one of the partners behind Drive Capital, which aims to bring Silicon Valley-style investing to the Midwest.

headline.main: Venture Capital Firm Focused on the Midwest Raises a $250 Million Fund
